name: Paradise (itch) (Pixel Limited)
description:
Paradise it`s amazing series of games. In it, you can freely walk around the world! This is the first such intense game from Pixel Limited. Now you can buy it from 0.99$ or download a free demo version!

Have a fun!

Note: This is early access! Most bugs are not fixed! Please help us made the game beautiful please report them! 

All files are DRM-free :)
